# variables APP="" # set this to the full path to your app (e.g. "/Applications/iTap RDP.app/") if you want to use an app other than the default system app (set empty if you want to use default app) TMPFILE=/tmp/temp_session.rdp # if you want to put the tempfile somewhere other than /tmp
# do not edit below this line unless you know what you're doing
QUERY={query}
# split query on : for IP and port IP=${QUERY%:*} PORT=${QUERY#*:} if [[ $IP == $PORT ]]; then PORT=3389 fi
# get search-domain if set, and append if IP looks like a shortname SD=$(awk '/^domain/ {print $2; exit}' /etc/resolv.conf) if [[ -n $SD ]] && [[ ! $IP =~ '.' ]]; then IP="${IP}.${SD}" fi
echo "screen mode id:i:2 use multimon:i:1 session bpp:i:32 full address:s:${IP}:${PORT} audiomode:i:0 disable wallpaper:i:0 disable full window drag:i:1 disable menu anims:i:1 disable themes:i:0 alternate shell:s: shell working directory:s: authentication level:i:0 connect to console:i:0 gatewayusagemethod:i:0 disable cursor setting:i:0 allow font smoothing:i:0 allow desktop composition:i:0 bookmarktype:i:3 use redirection server name:i:0 " > $TMPFILE
if [[ -n $APP ]]; then open $TMPFILE -a "$APP" else open $TMPFILE fi
sleep 2 rm -f $TMPFILE
Open iTap RDP to the provided hostname
